amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to develop, administer, purchase, acquire, or operate an unmanned aircraft system owned by the Department of Interior or the Environmental Protection Agency to perform surveying, mapping, or collecting remote sensing data.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 79 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit the use of funds to develop, administer, purchase, acquire, or operate an unmanned aircraft system owned by the Department of Interior or the Environmental Protection Agency to perform surveying, mapping, or collecting remote sensing data.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 262 (Roll no. 455).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 262 (Roll no. 455).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Perry.
